EmailTemplate.description: Sent when Sales Manager declines the Trade In ERP after it's been inspected by the shop
EmailTemplate.name: Trade-In Recommendations Declined
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Trade-In ERP Recommendations have been Declined
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good news! Your Trade-In ERP has been reviewed by the Sales Manager and has been approved. You may proceed to schedule the ERP accordingly.
Trade-In ERP URL: {!AcctSeed__Project__c.Link}
